Dusk Priestess: "[Seal of Strife]" If we control the Seal of Strife, the rules of a castle siege will be changed as follows: "Weak Defensive Mercenaries:" The lord of each castle cannot employ general defensive mercenaries, and can only employ novice mercenaries that are weaker than general mercenaries. "Decreased Castle Gate and Wall Defenfes:" The defensive power of the castle gate and wall are decreased dramatically. "Increased Castle Gate and Wall Upgrade Costs:" The cost to upgrade the castle and wall is increased dramatically. "Cancel Defending Clan's Registration:" During a castle siege, participation of all clans except for the clan that ownes the castle is canceled.
"Other benefits"
"Tax Rate Decrease:" The limit of the maximum tax rate that can be imposed by the lord of each castle is decreased. "Change in CP:" Combat Spirit Points (CP) of all Dusk members increases by 10%, and CP of all Dawn members decreases by 10%. "Wyvern Riding Prohibited:" During the available period of the seal, Wyvern cannot be ridden.
"Disadvantages When the Seal is Stolen:"
"Change Restart Village:" If those who have no position die, they will revive in the 2nd nearest village, not the nearest one, when they restart. "Siege Weapons Prohibited:" During a castle siege, siege weapons are not available for use.
